name: Ultimate Melee Meltdown
description:
This is Ultimate Melee Meltdown, a brawling game full of action packed battles and fun for up to four players! Just plug in a controller and add a player!

Features: 6 playable characters, and 6 playable maps!

Requires: At least 2 players and 2 controllers (One for each player)

Controls (PlayStation Controller): X - Jump, Square - Hit, Triangle - Dash

Controls (Xbox Controller): A - Jump, X - Hit, Y - Dash
